DO NOT BUY DIRECTLY FROM LOGITECH. IF YOU HAVE A PROBLEM IT TAKES 6 WEEKS OF PHONE CALLS AND EMAILS TO GET YOUR UNIT REPLACED. AMAZON DID IT IN LESS THAN A WEEK. THANKS AMAZON !

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Con
Reviews.Content: I have used this product for almost a month, and the camera was Easy to setup with my network. So far, so good. The product performed as I wanted it to. I was able to capture video of an intruder, a few days after I set it up. I have set up motion detector lights around the perimeter of house (front and back yard), as well as solar lighting (all through Amazon at a reasonable price). All in all, I am happy with my purchase and feel much safer, for myself and household members. This is my first purchase for a surveillance camera, so I do not have anything else to compare it to. Works well at night (night vision). I cannot see details of person face, however, I can see shape and form and movement well. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: frank f
Reviews.Content: Great camera with a great field of view, good HD picture, the only thing about this camera is you can view live image on your computer or on Logitech site, you can view alarm picture on you Iphone but not a live picture on your laptop if you are not at home or where ever you can access the router it is connected to so be fore warned if you want live picture of home at work no can do you can see picture at Logitech website but they kick you off with timer so you will have to keep reloging in, sure would be nice to be able to log into my computer from another computer to view 24/7 or publish on my website so it can be logged into for longer time.  Other than that is a great camera that only need some software changes

Reviews.Title: An ok camera but....
Reviews.Author: Jayman
Reviews.Content: **Buyer beware** If you plan to buy used think twice before selecting DirectDeals4u and here is why. The item arrived with no software or manual. They also blacked out the product PIN number required for support from Logitech. Any ability to receive support has been voided because of this. They failed to mention any of this in their description of the item. The camera has a defect as well, changes from colror to grey and white in the middle of the day and loses ability to focus.Regarding the camera:All in all the camera seems adequate. It delivers a nice clear picture (if it's working) and picks up sound very well. I don't like that you have no ability to set the length of recording time once it has been triggered by motion. Also it has no manual record feature. It may have just been my environment here at home but the software had difficulty finding the camera initially. After plugging and unplugging and trying this and that I finally got it to work.One other area that can be improved upon is the playback feature. All recordings are displayed on a time line with tiny blue lines representing the recordings. At times it can be difficult to select the recording you want and deleting a recording is done by right clicking on the tiny line which can prove to be quite difficult as well.

Reviews.Title: very bad technical assitence
Reviews.Author: Amin Makram Simaika
Reviews.Content: 120819-000794]From the very moment I installed this very expensive night vison camera every thing work perfect but it does not save a file I called the suplier on international calls and they kept on hold and when they decided to sell them back the camera becaue there was no way to repair they hanged the telphone and I did sent them many emails and now no ansewers what should I do is there an address at Amazon that I can send back this camera ?

Reviews.Title: Unable to return, missed 30 day return by 1 day
Reviews.Author: dfd105
Reviews.Content: I had purchased to install at my parents home, since it is out of town, I was unable to return when I discovered the system was missing one of the parts that made the system work inside the house.  It was an expensive mistake and had to go and by another complete system to complete the installation.  The missing part was what made the purchase so expensive.I was very disappointed that the seller had sent an incomplete system.

Reviews.Title: Safe your money
Reviews.Author: Rudolf Kroseberg
Reviews.Content: After spending over one hour on the phone with a technician I had enough. We tried everything and some more - couldn't get it to work.Returned it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Not as fancy as they say
Reviews.Author: Ammar
Reviews.Content: * if you got a wirless network with repeaters it will NOT work.* Blackberry software is still not available (under development)I beleive they should mention that in their ad!!!Our house is a two floors 550 Square Meters, so I have 4 repeaters connected to the main router in order to cover up all the area,how ever, the cam could not be found unless I plug the cam network adapter to the main router and be within the range of the main router!!!However, if you have no repeters in ur netwrok then this will be working perfectly with you, however I wont recommend it as its very expensive compared by similar cams.

Reviews.Title: Easy set up.. works well for me
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Flo"
Reviews.Content: This was an easy set up and that ease of setup was a PRIME concern... and I don't see how it can be any easier than this system - install the Commander software, plug the network adapter into the router and electrical outet, plug the camera into an electrical outlet and you're done. Video quality is excellent for these types of network cameras - but don't expect HD quality like what you see on your TV. I also wanted a system where a PC doesn't have to be on all the time and this fits the bill as well.Happy and feeling safer.. Thanks for a good product.

Reviews.Title: Camera works but...
Reviews.Author: qsauditor
Reviews.Content: the installation instructions were hard to read.  It was not the original but a copy of a copy of a...

Reviews.Title: Night vision annoying ring
Reviews.Author: Vern
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because the other one was working just fine and I wanted another for a different part of my house.  When I set it up, I checked to see how the picture was on my computer screen.  It looked to be working just fine.When I checked on it at night, there was an issue going on with the picture.  There's a large ring that was filling up majority of the screen.  I tried cleaning it, removing any smears, removed the plastic covering, etc.  It still wouldn't go away.Here's the image of the ring showing up in view. [...]

Reviews.Title: not able to set up despite following instructions
Reviews.Author: Ash
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this product after looking at all the reviews and watching you videos etc.When you opened the product it seems nice and camera is pretty nice also. However, I had a tough time going through set up. Spent hours and tried numerous times.I have Imac with airport express with one port and went out and got ethernet switch from netgear with 5 ports.I hooked everything up but couldnt locate powerline network adapter and couldnt locate the camera. I did online search and several people had the same problem here is the link. I will return this to best buy tomorrow.I ll buy a different system. I have set up a lot of electronic devices over the years and this is the most difficulty I have had with a device.[...]

Reviews.Title: Excellent cameras, computer, web and smart phone interfaces AND customer service too!
Reviews.Author: John "JohnJackon"
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased and surprised to have received a very nice message from the product manager! He left his phone number, I called him but he was in a loud room so he changed his location and called me back. We discussed my observations and suggestions and he informed me that several of them were identified just after the first of this year and are already being addressed as I write this review. The product manager is very committed to the continual improvement of the customer service, firmware, hardware, software, smartphone and web interfaces. He and his team take customer feedback and service very seriously and implement improvements ASAP.I HIGHLY recommend adding the two low cost optional premium services(Logitech Alert Mobile Commander and Logitech Alert Web Commander) which move the system from being 'just' great, to becoming FANTASTIC by adding many useful features! You can see a comparison of these premium services on their website. I just discovered you receive both services for just $79.95 per year! (From their page at: [...]Response from Logitech:By Logitech Alert Security Products Group, February 22, 2011Thank you for your feedback and we apologize for not clearly communicating the price for the Alert(tm) Mobile Commander and Alert(tm) Web Commander services. The subscription fee for these services is $79.99 USD per year. The fee includes the cost for both services.For security purposes, I also highly recommend logging onto the Logitech Alert Web Commander using https instead of http, wherever possible.Just go ahead and BUY THIS SYSTEM!

Reviews.Title: Setup not as intimidating as it looks.
Reviews.Author: GailK
Reviews.Content: This system is a little intimidating out of the box as there are a ton of little parts.  It took me a while to get around to installing as it looked like quite the project.  However, the directions are clear and easy to follow, and it took less than 30 minutes to set up a two camera system.  The software is simple and seems to work well.  The biggest advantage in my opinion is you can set the system up to alert you via email if movement is detected.  There is also a web page where you can sign in and view your cameras when you're away from home.  Best of all, there's an iphone app that also lets you check your cameras. Just viewing is free, if you want the deluxe versions that allow you to change camera setting remotely there is an additional fee.  Just viewing is sufficient for my needs however.One annoyance I've found so far is there are FOUR different colored very bright (some flash) LEDs on the power unit for the main camera.  It's VERY annoying and attention grabbing, and screams "UNPLUG ME!"  You can turn off the LEDs on the camera itself (I don't, love the deterrent) but there is no way to disable them on the power box.  They could do double duty as christmas lights.All in all, though it's a great system.  I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Not what i expected.
Reviews.Author: Carl R. Cheney
Reviews.Content: There is no night vision. I will have my son in law check it out. could be set up incorrectly. It's just not good for the front of my property. Lots of traffic on my street and it takes pictures of every thing that passes. Thanks Bob

Reviews.Title: NOTE: night vision nogo if viewing through window
Reviews.Author: GW
Reviews.Content: I do not recall this info being addressed in description of product prior to purchasing.  If I had known this, I would've ordered the non-night vision camera.  It is less expensive & why pay for an option you can't use anyway. Beyond this issue, the video quality is terrific. It did take several calls to Logitech support to get my system up & operating. The problems encountered were two-fold; my router required updates in order to acquire the camera feed, & Logitech support was lacking initially. The 1st tech support person did not follow root cause troubleshooting flow correctly which resulted in me ordering replacement camera unnecessarily.  This delayed getting my system up & operating for 4 days. Once I contacted the Logitech lead manager, support improved & all issues were corrected.  Amazon's response was outstanding handling reorder & return of product.

Reviews.Title: good but very very expensive
Reviews.Author: buyer101
Reviews.Content: hd quality, reliable but signal lost once in a while, also sometimes you just can't update the software, don't know why I am still with an older version, but with both software versions the cameras work and go off once in a while, just bought a second one cause already had the master system and didn't want to have like 20 monitors!! haha but now there are a lot of great and cheaper options, if this is going to be your first camera from logitech, don't buy!

Reviews.Title: CCTV camera failure to work
Reviews.Author: CCTV camera
Reviews.Content: I planned to arm my house with surveillance security camera. I decided to buy Logitech Alert 750e, therefore I ordered one set as trial, unfortunately after CCTV installation completed, the system failed to start:The software failed to detect the camera. 30 minutes later while trying to solve the problem, another problem emerged, the camera led lights went off.

Reviews.Title: Nice for what I'm using this for
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Video quality with this unit is quite nice in the daytime (the nighttime / nightvision mode isn't all it's cracked up to be, but somewhat cool nonetheless).Depending on what your needs are this system seems to offer something for everyone.You can view your content from your iphone (very cool) and if you set this up at home, even better, you can find out who's at the door prior to getting the door).If you have kids this is even more important, you can train them to look at the video monitor prior to opening the door (if your kids seem to like opening the door when expecting someone).It's also useful if you're in the kitchen with messy hands, and family is over, so you can just yell at em' to come in without having to wash up prior to going to the door.The main con is you have to pay for the software, it's 79$ a year, and that's somewhat disappointing, but for the piece of mind, ease of use and installation (thought it'd take much longer to setup!) this package is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Very good security system, but there are some flaws
Reviews.Author: Matthew K. Morgan
Reviews.Content: Security systems are sound investments when protecting your property, and Logitech has entered the market with two interchangeable systems. Both systems are indoor/outdoor, but each comes with either an indoor or an outdoor camera. I have the outdoor unit, though I received an indoor camera as well for testing.Setup is absurdly easy. From opening the box to having a working system takes roughly 10 minutes, and installing the control software is painless and easy. Once installed and configured you can start working with the system immediately.The cameras and the software communicate via network, so plan your network topology appropriately. We discovered two important issues, though, when using wireless networking to communicate with the cameras. First, the cameras have a tendency to drop connectivity all at once, and the only recourse is to power them off and back on again. This may be a function of the router we are using, but it still is important to keep in mind. Second, we loaded the software on a laptop and used that for controlling the cameras, and that worked well until the laptop was allowed to hibernate. When it came back, communication with the cameras was lost every time and the cameras needed to be power cycled. Though communication was lost with the cameras, the cameras continued to faithfully record so it could be worse.The cameras with this system are billed as HD and live up to it. Video is clear and crisp.The night vision capabilities on the outdoor camera are outstanding. Seeing in the dark is one of this particular camera's strengths. Unfortunately, the indoor camera does not have night vision so recording down a dark hallway will give poor results. This is an unfortunate design decision and hopefully will be addressed later.The cameras are activated by motion, and the sensitivity is set via a slider in the control software. At the highest sensitivity level, the slightest movement triggers the camera and it starts recording. For an outdoor unit this is too sensitive and the camera will eat through its storage quickly. However, for indoor cameras this is a fine setting when the home is unoccupied for a time.The cameras can handle larger memory cards but ship with 2GB cards. This is sufficient for starting off but for extended use you'll want a larger memory card.Because the cameras can be monitored remotely over the internet it is interesting to "tune in" and see what's happening (you can even tap in through your cell phone). It is also useful to transfer the contents of the cards remotely too.The cameras do not have a battery backup system, so put them on a battery backup if possible. When the power goes out, the eyes go dim.Logitech has put together a very nice security system that sports a number of nice features. There is room for improvement and there are some flaws, but overall this is a system worth the expense. Consider this system when looking for a security system setup to protect your property.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup and good quality
Reviews.Author: Lance Ramsay
Reviews.Content: Setup some of the outdoor models in a sawmill. After a month they are all still working, the build quality is good.Video quality is good too.

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: Magnum
Reviews.Content: Well,It was broken out of the box. Unrecognizable by the system. Logitech had me send it back and sent a new one, but didn't include the power supply.  A month later I still have no usable camera.  Still don't know if this one will work.Update: Logitech sucks!  Three packages later they have still not provided everything I sent them back.  They send one small part each month.  Still can't use the camera. This is an unusable item. The company, Logitech, is so disorganized it's amazing they are in business.  Defective products, defective personnel, lies, inadequate returns when things go wrong. Steer clear of all things Logitech.Horrible, horrible, horrible.

Reviews.Title: ALMOST PERFECT ! !
Reviews.Author: FLYBOY1
Reviews.Content: After 3 burglaries, should have done this sooner!It's time to pick up your cameras and firearms!If you don't have a dog, get one! They can smell stuff 2 blocks away!When the dog(s) "flip out", then you can use these cameras to verify the unwanted visitor!Then, you can introduce your unwanted visitor to your friends "Smith & Wesson"! LolAnd now the Master System! Drum roll, please!For the money, there is no Better System, Period!So, why just 4 stars?When they get the blackberry app working, it's an automatic 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: GLBT
Reviews.Content: I normally dread purchasing complicated electronics because I am less-than-gifted at putting this stuff together. Fortunately, you don't need to be a genius to set up the Logitech Alert 750e Outdoor Master Security System. The instructions are extremely clear and I had the whole thing up and running in about 30 minutes.Even more importantly, it works very well! The quality of the picture is good and it's easy to access from far away. This is a top notch product and one that I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Use ONLY Windows based computer ???
Reviews.Author: JoeR
Reviews.Content: I was interested in the Logitech Alert 750e and found the following specification: "For set-up you'll need: ...Windows-based computer...". I'm a Mac user, and Logitech certainly lost a new customer.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely horrible, do not buy
Reviews.Author: David Ernick
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my mother, as there had been some recent break-ins near her house.  On paper, it looks like a good system.  However, after several days of trying to set up the camera so that it's connected to my computer, I have finally given up.  There is simply no way I can view the images I'm supposed to see on my computer.  Good luck trying to reach customer service.  I've tried calling early, calling late, calling in the middle of the day and no one ever picks up, even after an hour on hold.  It's got way too many problems for me to ever recommend - if I could give it zero stars I would.

Reviews.Title: I don't get it
Reviews.Author: J. M. G.
Reviews.Content: What's the point of the cameras power supply (shown in the set-up guide)running down an exterior wall and into an outlet?  Aaaah, don't you just pull the plug.

Reviews.Title: Indian Customer Service ALL THE WAY
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: If you have great luck then I recommend you buy this product immediately.People with great luck get it to work on the first try and don't have to spent hours on the forums or with customer support. If however, you do not have sterling luck, stay away from this product at all cost. I own a lot of logitech stuff, gaming mice, keyboards, webcams, so I thought, what they heck? Those work great, maybe their security system will be just as good. Completely wrong, they should stick to mice and other small peripherals because it's all the can do. Details-Software could not find cameras, called technical service - ALL INDIANS. There are NO AMERICANS or westerners to troubleshoot your problems for this product. Yes, for $330 you get talk to Vishnu or Akmed or whoever the heck and if you REALLY have a problem then you can escalate to Tony. (He's Indian also but he has the best American accent). Please, please, please do yourself a favor and do not buy this product. You will regret it. I bought three cameras, and I'm just lucky that Logitech has such a great name because I've been able to offload them on Craigslist for almost what I paid. Suckers. Now I can go and buy a real product that is supported by people who know what a security camera is.P.S. I'm not against international call centers, for minor stuff, but this is a product that I spend close to a thousand dollars for. Even if I had bought just one, at $300, I expect real support. If you do choose to buy it, here - 888-469-4543. That's the direct line for the security camera technical support, direct to Mumbai. Believe me, you're going to need it.

Reviews.Title: Newer is not Better
Reviews.Author: Brian D. Law
Reviews.Content: Old Wilife cameras work great!New cameras have serious powerline problems. My new camera(alert) will not work except on only a few outlets. Support says too bad. My $300 camera is now worthless. I reinstalled my old cameraMinor problem solved. New cameras working fine.

Reviews.Title: Stop working after 10 days
Reviews.Author: L. Agranovich "TBlade"
Reviews.Content: This system stop working after 10 days.I spend 2 hours with Customer Service.They asked to send this camera back.To days later additional 2 cameras stop working.Worst system

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: kps1
Reviews.Content: I never had a worse buying experience. Not only a rotten product but Logitech support stunk. One support guy hung up on me after his failure to get the camera to be discoverable by the system. Another tech was so obnoxious I hung up on him.

Reviews.Title: works okay
Reviews.Author: Susan Bleiweiss "Sue b"
Reviews.Content: I won't launch into a long drawn out review of this product since there are already hundreds who have done that.  Setup is easy enough, the picture quality is ok but we'll see how well the cameras hold up over time.

Reviews.Title: Blurry night images | Mac denied again
Reviews.Author: James R. Livingston "DocZoom"
Reviews.Content: Logitech designer one: "Well, guys we finally got this system ready to go and it's a real peach! Our months of hardwork have achieved surveillance perfection!"Logitech designer two, "Oh wait, what about the Mac users out there? Our camera is gonna ship with only Windows software."Logitech designer one: "Oh, them guys don't care about security anyway! They won't be buying any security cameras and such...they got no money left after buying that expensive Mac. Stupid suckers! Haha!!"Logitech designer two: "I don't know. My wife's kid brother is pretty bright and he uses a Mac... he's always messing with this kind of stuff.Maybe we should ask the boss before we release this. You know, we want to cover all the bases before we go live."Logitech designer one: "Cover all the bases? Macs aren't a base! Besides, our system will work for Mac users and their iPhones and even iPads!!!"Logitech designer two: "Well yeah, but only after they use our Windows software on a PC to set it up. I think we ought toat least offer an easy set-up method for Mac users."Logitech designer one: "Look around dude. Do you see any Macs here? Of course not! Are you gonna go downto the Best Buy and buy a Mac so we can design and test?... I didn't think so."Logitech designer two: "Well, no they don't pay me enough for that. But, I just think that we could, you know...make the camera so that it can be set-up with a browser-based app of some kind... so it will work with any computer."Logitech designer one: "Dammit Dave! I just ordered all those blank CD's to put the software on. Do you think I'm gonnatell the boss that we decided to go with browser-based set-up now? And, waste all those CD's? I ain't gonna put my neck on the chopping block! ...Are you?"Logitech designer two: "No! I don't wanna get sacked. Oh...  well yeah. I guess you're right. And, come to think of it,I did apply for that job over at Microsoft... you know that'd be sweet! They pay so much more than Logitech! If they gotwind of us using some browser app instead of a bona fide Windows-only app, then they'd probably round-file my resume for good."Logitech designer one: "Now you're thinking! We got a great system here and we can say that it works with Macs even if theydo have to borrow a Windows PC to set it up at first. That's just a one-time thing you know. If the Mac users can't find a PC toborrow one-time, then they don't need a security camera anyway. They're just a bunch of whiners anyhow!"Logitech designer two: "Wait a second, didn't you apply for a job at Apple not long ago?"Logitech designer one: "Ha! That's cute! That was just to see what would happen. Do you really think they'd hire guys like us?"+++++OK, so, well... I borrowed a Windoze PeeCee and set the thing up. And, now I can actually see an image using my iPhone, iPad and the browser-based Logitech Alert Web Commander in Safari on my MacBook Pro. I gotta be honest with you, the daytime images are clear but the night time images are very blurry. Moreover, the time lag and sporadic capture is a problem if one expects to actually record any sort of usable video. This makes the email alerts altogether worthless. It will capture an image and send an email alert sometimes and sometimes not. Whilst testing, I observed cars passing on the street out front... I got an email alert that captured the blurry motion blur of headlights each time. But when I asked my wife to step outside and walk around, it failed to send any alerts at all. While I was watching her, I asked her to talk in a normal voice just a few feet from the camera. I didn't hear a thing through the camera. It was disappointing to see just ghostly blurred images with jerky motion. I gotta allow only two stars for this one. It's more or less a useable surveillance camera... but just barely. At least you can tell that someone is walking about. I imagine that those who've given this a great review have fairly low expectations and standards. For the hefty price, I expected much better..

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, very surprised
Reviews.Author: RB
Reviews.Content: Considering I'm not too technically oriented I was surprised at the ease of set up. Also, good quality. Go for it!
